From: Patrick Bunney <WarBarge@...>

:: Wolfgang ::

Yes, of course I know that.  Well, I suppose you would like to know where
are you, and whats up, so let me begin.  You are on Earth, and it just so
happens that you have arrived during a war so grand, that the restrictions
of time do not hinder it.  My name is Wolfgang.  I am the lea----- er..... I
am a bot under Zardus' authority.

:: Shutters ::

The Maximals and Predicons strive for survival as they make constant attacks
on each other.  A third party, the Alliance is nuetral party.  The
Decepticons and Autobots also play a large part in this war.  A battle is
going on right now.  We must help our comrades.  But lets keep this
apprentice thing to ourselves for the time being.  Remember, you are loyal
to me, your master.

:: Flies off towards the battle, signaling for Mastabot to follow. ::
